item.title: A Whale Address Liquidated ETH After Holding for 8 Months, Profiting a Total of $6.43 Million
item.description: On September 1st, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a whale address sold 3,158.5 ETH at a price of $4,376 and exchanged it for 13.2 million DAI. The ETH had been held for 8 months.Reportedly, the whale address initially bought 6,317 ETH 8 months ago with 326 cbBTC (approximately $21.24 million) and then sold all the ETH at a price of $27.67 million, realizing a total profit of $6.43 million.

item.title: A whale address has deposited 10.18 million U into Hyperliquid to short WLFI with 3x leverage.
item.description: On September 1st, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, Whale 0xA2f2 transferred 10.18 million USDC into Hyperliquid and took a short position in WLFI with a leverage of 3x. Currently, it is holding 6.84 million WLFI (valued at $1.9 million).

item.title: WLFI Official 'Initial Circulating Supply' Document Back Online
item.description: On September 1st, the WLFI official "Initial Circulating Supply" related Medium article was relaunched, confirming that the initial circulation is 24,669,070,265 tokens. Other data is as follows:· 10,000,000,000—allocated to World Liberty Financial, Inc. for the purpose of unlocking a part of the ecosystem.· 7,783,585,650—allocated to Alt5 Sigma Corporation as part of its financial strategy, with the company holding approximately 8% of WLFI's total supply.· 2,880,884,615—used for liquidity and marketing purposes to support the initial exchange listing.· 4,004,600,000—allocated to public sale participants, representing their initial 20% unlock at the time of issuance.

item.title: Liquidity Provider Farming Incentive (LPFI) tokens have been successively deposited by LPs into major CEXs.
item.description: On September 1st, according to Arkham data, the liquidity pool tokens of WLFI have successively entered various major CEXs through market makers Jump and DWF. These include: 21 million WLFI tokens flowed into Bybit 20 minutes ago. 10 million WLFI tokens flowed into Gate 2 hours ago. Just 5 minutes ago, another 15 million WLFI tokens flowed into Gate.

item.title: Bybit will list World Liberty Financial (WLFI)
item.description: On September 1st, as per official information, Bybit is going to list World Liberty Financial (WLFI) on its spot market.

item.title: 24-Hour Spot Funding Net Outflow Rankings: SOL Net Outflow $1.41 Billion, BTC Net Outflow $1.34 Billion, ETH Net Outflow $1.17 Billion
item.description: On September 1st, according to Coinglass data, the top cryptocurrencies in terms of net outflows of funds in the past 24 hours are as follows:- SOL had a net outflow of $141 million.- BTC had a net outflow of $134 million.- ETH had a net outflow of $117 million.- USDT had a net outflow of $59.28 million.- XRP had a net outflow of $55.71 million.In addition, there were no significant net inflows of non-stablecoin currencies on the net inflows list. The specific list is as follows:- USDC had a net inflow of $46.02 million.- FDUSD had a net inflow of $20.72 million.- EUR had a net inflow of $3.58 million.- FARTCOIN had a net inflow of $2.86 million.- USD1 had a net inflow of $2.54 million.

item.title: Bitget has launched the U-based LINEA perpetual contract, with leverage ranging from 1 to 5x.
item.description: On September 1st, as per the official announcement, Bitget has declared the launch of the U-index LINEA perpetual contract, with leverage ranging from 1 to 5.Moreover, Bitget will convert the WLFIUSDT perpetual contract from pre-market trading to regular trading with leverage ranging from 1 to 50 within 3 hours starting from 21:00 on September 1st (UTC+8) under stable index conditions, and the contract trading BOT will be activated simultaneously.

item.title: A certain newly created address withdrew 3601 ETH from Binance, and may subsequently stake all of it.
item.description: On September 1st, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a new address withdrew 3,601 ETH from Binance. The value of this withdrawal was $15.82 million. Subsequently, 32 ETH was sent to Everstake for staking, and there is a potential that all of the withdrawn ETH was staked.

item.title: WLFI: The token's initial circulating supply is 24.669 billion.
item.description: On September 1st, according to official channels, World Liberty Financial announced that the initial circulating supply of the WLFI token is 24,669,070,265 tokens. The distribution of the token supply is as follows:10,000,000,000 tokens are allocated to the unlocked ecological part of World Liberty Financial, Inc.7,783,585,650 tokens are allocated to Alt5 Sigma Corporation as part of its treasury strategy, accounting for approximately 8% of the total supply of WLFI.2,880,884,615 tokens are designated for liquidity and market promotion to support the Initial Exchange Offering (IEO).4,004,600,000 tokens are allocated to public sale participants, representing 20% that is initially unlocked at the time of issuance.

item.title: WLFI Deletes Blog Post on "Clarification of Token Initial Circulating Supply"
item.description: On September 1st, according to the official website, WLFI has removed the previously posted blog article regarding the initial circulation supply of the token.
